text: Benjamin Beresford is a British child actor known for his role as Joshua Peacock on ITV's Coronation Street. Ben has played the role since 2004, taking over from Brandon Jackson and Stephen Collins.

dbp:agent: James Foster at James Foster Ltd.

text: Anna Savva is an actress who has appeared in many British TV shows since 1985. She has had roles in Minder, Prime Suspect and Planespotting. She was also a puppeteer in Little Shop of Horrors. Most recently, she played Anna Pappas in EastEnders. Anna will be seen as Lugaretzia in six episodes of Simon Nye's 'The Durrells' in 2016

Mark Reinier Tajon Luz (born February 8, 1988 in Quezon City, Philippines) or better known as Mark Luz is a Filipino actor, Model and television personality, He is best known for one of the contestant in Pinoy Big Brother: Unlimited among with Kim De Guzman Mark's love interest in the Big Brother House on daily entry.
